    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2873</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Wise men and the elephant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die klugen Männer und der Elefant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les hommes sages et l'éléphant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os homens sábios e o elefante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli uomini saggi e l'elefante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα σοφά άτομα και ο ελέφαντας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los hombres sabios y el elefante</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for an activity where students read the well known Indian folktale, answer questions about it, and write a report based on the behaviors observed. Includes an assessment rubric.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">description</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">observation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">folktales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">genre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine Aktivität, in der 
Kursteilnehmer das weithin bekannte indische folktale lesen, Fragen 
über es beantworten und einen Report schreiben, der auf dem 
beobachteten Verhalten basiert. Enthält eine Einschätzung 
Rubrik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une activité où les 
étudiants lisent le folktale indien bien connu, répondent à des 
questions à son sujet, et écrivent un état basé sur les 
comportements observés. Inclut une rubrique d'évaluation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma atividade onde os 
estudantes leiam o folktale indian sabido poço, respondam a perguntas
sobre ele, e escrevam um relatório baseado nos comportamentos 
observados. Inclui um rubric da avaliação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per un'attività dove gli 
allievi leggono il folktale indiano ben noto, gli rispondono le 
domande e scrivono un rapporto basato sui comportamenti osservati. 
Include una rubrica di valutazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια δραστηριότητα όπου οι 
σπουδαστές διαβάζουν το καλά γνωστό ινδικό folktale, απαντούν
στις ερωτήσεις για το, και γράφουν μια έκθεση βασισμένη στις 
συμπεριφορές παρατηρηθείσες. Περιλαμβάνει μια ρουμπρίκα 
αξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una actividad donde 
los estudiantes leen el folktale indio bien conocido, contestan a 
preguntas sobre él, y escriben un informe basado en los 
comportamientos observados. Incluye una rúbrica del gravamen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
